fields.summary: Android: Font property doesn't work for Picker and PickerColumn

comments.body:
Verified with test environment:

Appc-Studio:3.3.0.201405011408
sdk:3.3.0.v20140502133323
acs:1.0.14
alloy:1.4.0-dev
npm:1.3.2
titanium:3.3.0-dev
titanium-code-processor:1.1.1
xcode:5.1.1
Device:LG-P970(V4.0.4)

Font property for Picker and Picker Column is working fine.
But it is not working fine on iOS. Font Size and FontWeight does not show any differences.
